duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the development, testing, optimization, and maintenance of Oracle business intelligence solutions such as Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC).
Analysis, maintenance, development, and deployment of business intelligence data models, dashboards, reports, and subject areas.
Creation of test data and execution of unit and system testing.
Monitoring the availability of the application and troubleshooting system issues.
Delivery of BI functionality in conjunction with approved project efforts, ad-hoc querying, and decision support against the data warehouse.
Learning new software technologies, especially those consistent with support requirements.

Building strong partnerships with the Technology Organization’s Business partners, the internal Shared Support Solutions group, the Project Management Office, Oracle Corporation, and other technical and consulting resources.
Providing timely production and end-user support for OAC both during and after business hours.
Configuration, implementation, and support of OAC as the analytics footprint expands.
Assisting in the monitoring of production applications and databases with the overall goal of resolving performance issues and identifying potential future problems.
Creating technical programming specifications, internal program documentation, and participating in peer reviews.
Providing time/effort estimates, contributing to project planning, and providing task and project status to end users, peers, and management.
Communicating issues and issue resolution to management and business partners in a clear, concise manner while managing multiple priorities.
Assisting in helping the company grow in the analytics space utilizing technologies such as OAC, to empower the business with modern AI-powered, self-service analytics capabilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
